Trade/Device Name(s): Copan FecalSwab Collection, Transport and Preservation System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): BD MAX Extended Enteric Bacterial Panel
Methodologies: Sample collection and transport for enteric bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Copan FecalSwab Collection, Transport and Preservation System as a collection and transport device for stool and rectal specimens, validated for use with BD MAX Enteric and Extended Bacterial Panels.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection and preservation of viable enteric pathogenic bacteria from rectal swabs and stool specimens during transport to the testing laboratory; stool specimens collected are also suitable for use with BD MAX Enteric Bacterial Panel and Extended Enteric Bacterial Panel.
